original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2131)@</color>顯現一把芭蕉巨扇，對前方大範圍扇形區域製造出一片旋風，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2131)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2131)@</color> A giant plantain fan appears, creating a whirlwind on a large fan-shaped area in front of you. <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2131)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> causes spell damage to the enemy.
